comment.text: The "DownloadReportBtnText" translation key is used to display the text for a download report button in various UI elements, such as reports and audit trails, allowing users to access and export data. This text is expected to be concise and action-oriented, providing clear instructions for users to initiate the download process.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation 'ダウンロードのレポート' is not a natural or accurate translation of "Download report". While it literally translates to "Download's report", it's not idiomatic Japanese for a button label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: レポートをダウンロード

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Transferir o relatório" is understandable, a more precise and commonly used translation for "Download report" in a technical context would be "Baixar relatório". "Transferir" implies moving something that already exists, while "Baixar" directly conveys the action of downloading.

The translation "වාර්තාව බාගන්න" while understandable, isn't the most natural or accurate translation of "Download report". A more common and preferred phrasing would use a more formal verb for 'download'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වාර්තා පත්‍රය බාගන්න (Warta pataraya baganna) or වාර්තාව බාගත කරන්න (Wartaya bagathakata karna)
